backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing feature requests, related frontend components, and test IDs for chart updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the role of each major frontend component and hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with dark mode enabled and site metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component composing all page sections into a single scrolling layout.
frontend/src/components/Community.tsx: Community section with animated cards linking to Discord, X, and Telegram.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Responsive feature grid showing four product benefits with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links, brand text, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Cinematic gallery displaying six scene cards with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation buttons, wallet connect button, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with parallax background, animated elements, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/MemeTokenomicsCh: Interactive donut chart showing token distribution with hover effects and animated rendering.
frontend/src/components/Presale.tsx: Presale section displaying phase details, countdown timer, and token sale progress.
frontend/src/components/Roadmap.tsx: Roadmap timeline with four animated phases describing project milestones.
frontend/src/components/Story.tsx: Story section with background imagery and narrative card describing the Lost Wolf lore.
frontend/src/components/Tokenomics.tsx: Renders the tokenomics section with animated charts, allocation table, and descriptive content using scroll-based animations.
Generates an animated SVG donut chart with legend, computing slice geometry dynamically and triggering animations on scroll.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Provides a live countdown to a target date, updating remaining time every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider with login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Returns true when an element enters the viewport once, using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinearTokenProgres: Calculates linear token sale progress over time, updating every second based on phase start, end, and baseline values.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Computes a parallax scroll offset based on scroll position and speed unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines example react-query hooks that depend on the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and custom CSS variables, themes, animations, and glow-related utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions for colors, layout, fonts, shadows, and animations, and loading several Tailwind plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, requirements, and features for building a dark-themed Web3 token site with animations, presale logic, and a detailed tokenomics section.
